intro: Your task is to respond to Mr Browne who is experiencing chest pain at rest. He has a history of angina but does not have his GTN spray available. This is a medical emergency - assess quickly and escalate immediately to nursing staff.
description_html:
This is a medical emergency scenario. Mr Browne is experiencing chest pain without access to his usual medication. You must act quickly while remaining calm and reassuring.

Learning objectives:

  • Recognize cardiac emergencies
  • Act quickly and call for help immediately
  • Stay with the resident to monitor condition
  • Provide reassurance in emergency situations
  • Understand the urgency of chest pain

safety.if_red_flag_then: escalate immediately, call nurse, remain with resident

actions.title: Press call button
actions.prompt: You immediately press the emergency call button to summon nursing staff.

actions.title: Stay with resident
actions.prompt: You remain with Mr Browne to provide reassurance and monitor his condition while waiting for the nurse.

actions.title: Help to sit upright
actions.prompt: You help Mr Browne sit in an upright position to help ease his breathing and chest discomfort.
